body_html:
Thanks Luke.
I've done this for pip install torch.
I'm not the owner/maintainer of pytorch, @graingert is, and he said he'll transfer it to me / give commit rights. Once he gives me those rights, will do for pip install pytorch too.

body:
Thanks Luke.
I've done this for `pip install torch`.
I'm not the owner/maintainer of pytorch, @graingert is, and he said he'll transfer it to me / give commit rights. Once he gives me those rights, will do for `pip install pytorch` too.
